Reviews.Title: MLB LCD T.V.
Reviews.Author: curve ball "philsfan"
Reviews.Content: Great office tv for that sports fan. or for that sports fan in your home for there room. Its not the top of the line picture, but it gets the job done. i love it. would recommend. a must buy

ProductInfo.Features:
15 inch 4:3 LCD Television
1024 x 768 Pixels Resolution, with 3-D Y/C Digital comb filter
500 cd/m2 Brightness, 500:1 Contrast Ratio
Matching Designer Remote Control
4-in-1 connection cable for S-Video, Composite Video and Audio.  Headphone Jack, V-Chip, Closed Captioning and Stereo Speakers.
ProductInfo.Name: Hannspree's MLB Phillies Sandlot 15-Inch LCD Television
